alert.note: Alert for City of Suffolk; Isle of Wight; Southampton (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 5:28PM EDT until August 10 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN ISLE OF WIGHT...AND EAST CENTRAL SOUTHAMPTON COUNTIES AND THE WEST CENTRAL CITY OF SUFFOLK... At 527 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sedley, or 8 miles north of Franklin, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Zuni around 535 PM EDT. Windsor and Carrsville around 600 PM EDT. Holland around 615 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Walters, Collosse, Boaz, Burdette and Indika. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: City of Suffolk; Isle of Wight; Southampton
